amendment.description: An amendment numbered 167 printed in House Report 116-457 to express the sense of Congress that the decision to withdraw from the Treaty on Open Skies did not comply with Section 1234(a) of the 2020 National Defense Authorization Act and that confidence and security building measures remain vital to the strategic interests of our NATO allies and partners.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 167 printed in House Report 116-457 to express the sense of Congress that the decision to withdraw from the Treaty on Open Skies did not comply with Section 1234(a) of the 2020 National Defense Authorization Act and that confidence and security building measures remain vital to the strategic interests of our NATO allies and partners.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Panetta amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A015) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Panetta amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Panetta amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Panetta.
